title: Polki Kundan & Emerald Chandbali Earrings - A Timeless Elegance
features: Classic Chandbali design, featuring a floral top cluster meticulously set with Polki diamonds. The crescent-shaped earring body is adorned with more Polki diamonds, interspersed with a central Zambian Emerald. Dangling Zambian Emerald drops, each delicately accented with freshwater pearls, add graceful movement. The use of uncut Polki diamonds provides a unique, antique feel.
occasions: or adding a touch of heritage to contemporary outfits.
description: A stunning blend of traditional craftsmanship and regal elegance. The use of Polki diamonds offers a unique, heritage aesthetic. The Zambian Emeralds add a vibrant pop of color, creating a captivating contrast. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and durability. This piece is a true heirloom, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry design.
